We Make Business Websites For South Africa

Good looking, lightning fast and SEO friendly. Everything is coded from scratch for fantastic performance.

What Makes Us Different?

At Uys Design, we specialize in web design for small businesses and we do development for the whole South Africa. The reason we don't use WordPress and rather code everything from scratch is because we want optimal site performance and better search rankings for your site. We also offer 24/7 support and we are always available to make any edits to the site that you would want. We want to foster long-term relationships with our clients and grow with them.

Built from Scratch

Our sites are built from scratch with HTML and CSS, which means faster load times and a better customer experience.

Fully Responsive

More than half of your customers will use their phones to access your website. We make sure the experience is great on any device.

Learn why this is important →

Optimized for SEO

We make sure that you business ranks well for key search terms in your industry.

Our Offer
